scripts.clean:reports: if exist cypress\reports rmdir /s /q cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports
scripts.clean:allure: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report
scripts.generate:report: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/.jsons/*.json -o cypress/reports/report.json && npx marge cypress/reports/report.json -f index -o cypress/reports/html
scripts.cypress:run: npm run clean:reports && cypress run && npm run generate:report
scripts.cypress:report: npm run clean:reports && cypress run && npm run generate:report && start cypress\reports\html\index.html
scripts.smokeTest: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/practiceE2E.cy.ts' && npm run generate:report
scripts.test:smoke: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --env grep=@smoke && npm run generate:report
scripts.test:smoke:report: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --env grep=@smoke && npm run generate:report && start cypress\reports\html\index.html
scripts.test:bdd:smoke: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/BDD/**/*.feature' --env tags=@smoke && npm run generate:cucumber:report
scripts.test:bdd:smoke:report: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/BDD/**/*.feature' --env tags=@smoke && npm run generate:cucumber:report && start cypress\reports\cucumber-html\index.html
scripts.test:bdd:all: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/BDD/**/*.feature' && npm run generate:cucumber:report
scripts.test:bdd:all:report: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/BDD/**/*.feature' && npm run generate:cucumber:report && start cypress\reports\cucumber-html\index.html
scripts.test:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:all:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*' && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:e2e:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.{cy.ts,feature}' && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:tdd:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/**/*.cy.ts' && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:smoke:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/**/*.cy.ts' --env grep=@smoke && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:bdd:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/BDD/**/*.feature' && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:bdd:smoke:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/BDD/**/*.feature' --env tags=@smoke && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:all:reports: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:allure && cypress run && npm run generate:report && npm run generate:allure:report
scripts.test:db: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/EmployeesDBTest.cy.ts' && npm run generate:report
scripts.test:db:report: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/EmployeesDBTest.cy.ts' && npm run generate:report && start cypress\reports\html\index.html
scripts.test:db:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/EmployeesDBTest.cy.ts' && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:db:advanced: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/AdvancedDBValidation.cy.ts' && npm run generate:report && start cypress\reports\html\index.html
scripts.test:db:all: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/EmployeesDBTest.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/TDD/AdvancedDBValidation.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/TDD/DBConnectionTest.cy.ts' && npm run generate:report && start cypress\reports\html\index.html
scripts.test:excel: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/ExcelValidation.cy.ts' && npm run generate:report
scripts.test:excel:report: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/ExcelValidation.cy.ts' && npm run generate:report && start cypress\reports\html\index.html
scripts.test:excel:allure: npm run clean:allure && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/ExcelValidation.cy.ts' && npm run generate:allure:report && npm run open:allure:report
scripts.test:excel:smoke: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/TDD/ExcelValidation.cy.ts' --env grep=@smoke && npm run generate:report && start cypress\reports\html\index.html
